value:
I wonder how Catria and Est are
doing... It's natural to worry about
my younger sisters, of course.

I'm told that I'm good at looking out
for others. Perhaps because of my
younger sisters?

Thank you for all you do. When
you've finished checking on
everyone, please do get some rest.

How are you today? If you're sore
from battle, I actually know how to
massage hurting muscles.

Ah! I just remembered I should go
look after the pegasi...

Honored to meet you. Someone
sent me to say hello—your
friend $Nf.

How wonderful! I can't help
but smile.

Oh, I know I can grow stronger
than this!
How disheartening...

Thank you so much. I will
continue to do my best.

I am Palla, a pegasus knight of
the Whitewings of Macedon.
Pleased to be of service.

Of course, Princess Minerva will
always be my liege and foremost
in my thoughts.$k$pAnd obviously my two sisters are
very dear to me. However...$k$pI must confess that someone else
is now occupying many of my
thoughts. Someone I met here...$k$pAhem. I hope I can continue to stay
by your side and make you proud.$k$pOh, thank you so much! You've
made me so happy!
はいっ！
ええいっ！
きゃああっ！
Oh no...!
My apologies.
Shall we?
I cannot be merciful.
Allow me to demonstrate!
I'm sorry.
Heehee
Is something the matter?
AH! Oh, you startled me, you trickster you.
We must all strive to do our best out there.
You aren't hurt, are you?
I can't help but take care of you and the others.
Please, make sure you take time to rest. We need you!
If you need my help with anything, please let me know.
Yes?
Here we go.
Onward.
